Udakapūjaka Thera：An arahant．In a previous birth he saw Padumuttara Buddha journeying through the air and wished to offer him some water．He，therefore，threw some water into the air，which the Buddha，out of compassion，stopped to receive．

Sixty-five kappas ago Udakapūjaka became king three times under the name of Sahassarāja （Ap．i．142-3）．

He is probably identical with Kutivihāriya Thera．ThagA．i．129．
